Researchers at the IMF

Economic research is a core activity at the IMF. A number of staff engaged in research have made their CVs available online. Please see the list below, which can be sorted alphabetically or by internal IMF department.

Find Researchers

  • Name
  • Field of Expertise
  • Public Finance
